grape.embiggen.embedders.graph_cbow package¶

Submodules¶

grape.embiggen.embedders.graph_cbow.GraphCBOW module¶

GraphCBOW model for graph embedding.

The GraphCBOW model for graoh embedding receives a list of contexts and tries to predict the central word. The model makes use of an NCE loss layer during the training process to generate the negatives.

grape.embiggen.embedders.graph_cbow.GraphCBOW.embedding¶

Return model embeddings.

grape.embiggen.embedders.graph_cbow.GraphCBOW.name¶

Return model name.

grape.embiggen.embedders.graph_cbow.GraphCBOW.trainable¶

Return whether the embedding layer can be trained.

Raises

NotImplementedError, – If the current embedding model does not have an embedding layer.

Module contents¶

GraphCBOW model for graph embedding.

GraPE
